input.sentences: some windows had bars on them .
others were just slits in the shape of the cross .
the old wooden door was only one way into the courtyard .
i visited this local church many times .
output.sentences: The history that lies beneath the vaulted ceilings of this church is fascinating.
Who once stood here looking through these bars and windows?
The detail of the cross with it slits and unique shape is amazing.
I am curious to go through the wooden door to the courtyard, would I find some beggar wanting food?
Royalty probably has visited this local castle many times.
